paper_abstract: In this note, we consider the permutahedron, the convex hull of all permutations of . We show how to obtain an extended formulation for this polytope from any sorting network. By using the optimal Ajtai-Komls-Szemer,di sorting network, this extended formulation has variables and inequalities. Furthermore, from basic polyhedral arguments, we show that this is best possible (up to a multiplicative constant) since any extended formulation has at least inequalities. The results easily extend to the generalized permutahedron.
paper_title: Smallest compact formulation for the permutahedron
